snippet: Disagreements between finance ministers left open the question of how long Spain could go without outside financial assistance.
abstract: News analysis; discord among European Union finance ministers over the euro zone bank rescue plan leaves open the question of how long Spain can go without outside financial assistance; European Central Bank intervention in the Spanish bond market could carry conditions from international lenders that Spain is unlikely to welcome.

byline.contributor: Jack Ewing contributed reporting from Frankfurt, Raphael Minder from Madrid and Landon Thomas Jr. from London.

lead_paragraph: Disagreements between finance ministers left open the question of how long Spain could go without outside financial assistance.

headline.seo: Euro Zone Discord on Banks Threatens Spain
headline.main: No Easy Answers on How to Fix the Banks in Europe
headline.print_headline: For Spain, Rising Risk In Discord
